articles.title: NATO leader says Turkey has agreed to support Finland and Sweden joining alliance - CBC News
articles.description: Turkey agreed Tuesday to lift its opposition to Sweden and Finland joining NATO, a breakthrough in an impasse clouding a leaders' summit in Madrid amid Europe's worst security crisis in decades triggered by the war in Ukraine.
articles.content: Turkey agreed Tuesday to lift its opposition to Sweden and Finland joining NATO, a breakthrough in an impasse clouding a leaders' summit in Madrid amid Europe's worst security crisis in decades trigg… [+5640 chars]

articles.author: Hans van Leeuwen, Les Hewitt
articles.title: What is the role of NATO? - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: After the Cold War, the organisation went from being a defensive alliance against the Soviet Union to an expansive one aimed at European peace and stability. Now it’s trying to do both.
articles.content: In the early 1990s, the Cold War ended and the map of Europe was rapidly and radically redrawn. Once the Berlin Wall came down in 1989, Warsaw Pact countries and Soviet republics began breaking away … [+8770 chars]
